name: Left Right Cool Crap
description:
A game about trying to get somewhere by car. And hit some cones. But who is really driving here?

This game is a GMTK 2020 submission. As most of the GMTK submissions, this game has bugs. Only first two levels are playable. We are going to fix AI bugs and update the game here:

https://keepcalmgaming.github.io/gmtk2020/

Probably. But for now we'll just go and rest a couple of days. Let us know what you think about the theme in comments.
